譜.definition: chart; list; table; register; score (music); spectrum (physics); to set to music

譜係.definition: variant of 譜系|谱系[pu3 xi4]

譜寫.definition: to compose (a piece of music); (fig.) to create, by one's actions, a narrative (generally one that can be recounted with pride)

譜曲.definition: to compose a piece of music

譜牒.definition: genealogical record; record of ancestors; family tree
